statements: UPDATE customer_issues SET status='Resolved', resolution='Issue resolved successfully' WHERE id=1
UPDATE customer_issues SET issue_description='Customer wants a refund', status='Open' WHERE customer_id=2
UPDATE customer_issues SET resolution = 'Fixed', status = 'Closed' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE customer_issues SET issue_description = 'New issue reported', status = 'Open' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE issues SET resolution = 'Fixed' WHERE issue_id = 1;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_date = now(), resolution_description = 'Issue resolved successfully.' WHERE issue_id = 2;
UPDATE issues SET issue_description = 'Updated issue description', resolution = 'Fixed' WHERE issue_id = 1;
UPDATE resolutions SET resolution_description = 'New resolution description' WHERE resolution_id = 2;
UPDATE CustomerIssues SET resolution = 'Resolved' WHERE issue_id = 123;
UPDATE CustomerHistory SET end_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE start_date = '2022-07-01' AND customer_id = 456;
UPDATE CustomerIssues SET issue_status='Resolved', resolution='Issue resolved successfully' WHERE customer_id=101 AND issue_id=1;
UPDATE CustomerHistory SET resolution='Issue resolved successfully', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE customer_id=202 AND history_id=3;
UPDATE Customer SET phone = '+1234567890', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Resolution SET resolution_description = 'Issue resolved successfully!', resolution_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE resolution_id = 1;
UPDATE Customer SET phone = '+1234567890', customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET address='123 Main St, New York' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE issues SET resolved=true, resolution_description='Issue resolved successfully', resolved_date='2022-01-15' WHERE issue_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET email='newemail@example.com', address='123 Main St' WHERE customer_id=1;
